extendedInfo.description: NOTE: WiFi ON is for C Spire Wireless Android customers only.Welcome to the WiFi ON application from C Spire Wireless! This is a free service that gives you access to the worldâs largest network of quality WiFi hotspots. WiFi ON automatically connects your device to select public and amenity WiFi hotspots and helps you save on mobile data usage. Additionally, WiFi ON tests the hotspots for functionality and Quality of Service (QoS). Once set-up, WiFi ON operates in the background â no user intervention is required. WiFi ON makes connecting to WiFi networks convenient and easy.Note that WiFi ON does not replace the native Android Wi-Fi connection manager. Rather, WiFi ON boosts the connection managerâs performance by identifying which hotspots to connect to and, more importantly, how to connect to them.  For example, many public hotspots are portal based and this means a user with an ordinary Android device must manually connect to the hotspot SSID in the device settings and then must launch their device browser and tap on an âacceptâ button on the portal page before they get a working WiFi connection. WiFi ON takes care of all these steps automatically for over 12 million pre-qualified public and amenity WiFi hotspots.WiFi ON is designed to have negligible impact on battery life when compared to an equivalent device that has Wi-Fi enabled.  If you notice a change, it may be because your data consumption is increasing and/or because the screen is enabled more often. Using WiFi ON ensures the maximum benefit can be obtained from having Wi-Fi enabled and is strongly recommended.

reviews.title: Unistalled.
reviews.comment: I uninstalled this app after about a month.  It drains battery life.  I was still required to sign on to public networks despite accepting the terms and conditions. Found myself repeatedly turning wifi off because network sign in took too long to be bothered with.   Simpler to just turn wifi on manually when I wanted to get off the mobile network.
reviews.author: Doug Miller

reviews.title: same as native phone Wi-Fi
reviews.comment: This app cuts out \"a button push\" if you turn on native Wi-Fi, it will connect to any open hot spot connection.  If you have to enter credentials, you still have to enter them into the app. Your native Wi-Fi connection saves this info already. This app saves you no step and is a ploy and total waste of time. Boo Bad Boo, C Spire. Give us an app that breaks locked, passworded Wi-Fi and then you\'ll have something.
reviews.author: Kevin Nabors

reviews.title: Slows bandwidth down
reviews.comment: On home wifi With out app installed:  67mbps down 21mbps up on home wifi With app:  1.3mbps down and 0.3mbps up  So yeah. Some kind of major bug there on my GS3. It\'s pretty much a pointless app anyway since it does basically the same as the stock Wifi.
reviews.author: Johnathan Seymour

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works just as it says and doesnt drain battery.
reviews.author: reuben watkins

reviews.title: App does not work
reviews.comment: This app does not work. U still have to manually sign in to all open networks no matter where u are
reviews.author: Bernardo Little

reviews.title: So easy to get WiFi access anywhere!
reviews.comment: Its so cool....my phone just switches to WiFi whenever there is a network available.   I don\'t even have to log in and I\'m connected.  PLUS I\'m not getting WIFi battery drain!
reviews.author: Donna Morgan

reviews.title: When does it work?
reviews.comment: I honestly don\'t see how it\'s working. I\'m still having to sign on to wifi signals. And isn\'t it supposed to turn off wifi when there is no signal available?
reviews.author: Courtney Williams

reviews.title: i phone
reviews.comment: it needs to work with i phones that is on c-spire networks but it don\'t.
reviews.author: tim keller

reviews.title: Drains battery
reviews.comment: Uninstalled tbis app it constantly scanning drawing more battery power than it is suppose to be saving.
reviews.author: John Michaelis

reviews.title: Seriously flawed
reviews.comment: It can\'t be moved to the SD card on my HTC Desire, and it takes up nearly 18 MB. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Melissa Rhyne

reviews.title: Only for stock phones
reviews.comment: It won\'t work for those of us with rommed phones, even if they are cspire phones. Sad to see then discriminate on a service. A log in for our cspire account to activate the app seems more effective.
reviews.author: Joshua Dacus

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: If Like most people you generally are connected to your home or work WiFi,  this app is completely pointless.
reviews.author: Dawn Rosenberg Davis

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do what it promises
reviews.comment: This app does not do what it promises.  It promises to connect to public hotspots automatically with \"no user intervention\" but no matter where I go I have to manually connect just like I always have.  Very annoying.
reviews.author: Robert Cross

reviews.title: Not comparable
reviews.comment: Sounds like a great app but it only works with cspire phones
reviews.author: Matthew Hagwood

reviews.title: Sorry
reviews.comment: I swear c spire is getting sorry smh
reviews.author: GARRY Lumpkin
